member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: T:QuakeWaveGenerator.MapFileTool
member.summary: Miscellaneous tooling methods for generating Quake Map File data.

member.name: M:QuakeWaveGenerator.MapFileTool.GenerateFuncTrainSettings(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates the "func_train" entity code lines with properties set according to the UI selection.
member.param: The base name for the target the func_train is aiming to start from.
Indicates whether a sound (ratchet metal) should be played.
member.returns: The string representing the starting lines of a func_train entity.

member.name: M:QuakeWaveGenerator.MapFileTool.GenerateBaseTargetName(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates the base target name based on the passed row and column information.
member.param: The row of the target path_corner.
The column of the target path_corner.
member.returns: The base target name containing row and column information.

member.name: M:QuakeWaveGenerator.MapFileTool.GeneratePathCorner(System.String,QuakeWaveGenerator.PathCornerType,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a path_corner entity for various types (init, top, bottom) for the given coordinates.
member.param: The base target name to be used.
The type of the path_corner (i.e. how it is used - for init, as top or as bottom).
The x coordinate.
The y coordinate.
The z coordinate.
member.returns: The code lines for the path_corner entity.
member.exception: Thrown when an invalid value for PathCornerType is passed.

member.name: M:QuakeWaveGenerator.MapFileTool.GenerateFace(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a code line defining one of the six faces of a brush for the func_train entity.
member.param: The x coordinate for the first point of the plane defining the face.
The y coordinate for the first point of the plane defining the face.
The z coordinate for the first point of the plane defining the face.
The x coordinate for the second point of the plane defining the face.
The y coordinate for the second point of the plane defining the face.
The z coordinate for the second point of the plane defining the face.
The x coordinate for the third point of the plane defining the face.
The y coordinate for the third point of the plane defining the face.
The z coordinate for the third point of the plane defining the face.
The texture name to be used for.
member.returns: The code line defining the face of the brush.

member.name: M:QuakeWaveGenerator.MapFileTool.StepSequence(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates the number of steps (in terms of height) that will be used for the wave running through the func_path entities.
member.param: The number of steps (i.e. how many different heights the func_train entities can have).
The height of each step.
member.returns: An array containing the individual step heights going up from 0 and then going back down again (e.g. 0 2 4 6 8 6 4 2).

member.summary: The type of the path_corner.

member.summary: Default value.

member.name: F:QuakeWaveGenerator.PathCornerType.Init
member.summary: path_corner used for initialising the func_train.

member.name: F:QuakeWaveGenerator.PathCornerType.Bottom
member.summary: The bottom of the path the func_train moves along.

member.name: F:QuakeWaveGenerator.PathCornerType.Top
member.summary: The top of the path the func_train moves along.
